boardgame.name: Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-Man
boardgame.description: Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-Man is a collectible dice-building tabletop game designed by Quarriors! creators Michael Elliott and Eric M. Lang._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;Man Starter Set features fan favorite characters like Spider-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;Man, Ghost Rider, Kingpin, and more! Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;Man premieres the Sinister Six, Allies, Underdogs, and other exciting mechanics!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;With game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;play that supports two players in epic dice battles, Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;Man will let players build their own team of heroes or villains! The Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;Man Starter Set is perfect for the Dice Masters veteran or someone looking to jump into the game fresh!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Introducing more than 30 heroes and villains (and their dice!), Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;shy;Man will be sure to stick out as a highlight of your Dice Masters collections!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-Man Gravity Feed features fan favorite characters like Spider-Man, Gwen Stacy, Aunt May, Blink, The Sinister Six, Agent Venom, Cloak, Dagger, and more!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Marvel Dice Masters: The Amazing Spider-Man has brand new mechanics for Allies and Underdogs. Even when the odds are against Spider-Man, he_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll surprise you with some new tricks!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Hand crafted dice bags. These bags have an inner layer and have dice as draw string ends. Please specify the style you would like: Marvel Heroes, Marvel Covers, Spider-Man, Batman, or DC Ladies. The bags are 4x6 inches flat. Shipping is $2. 3 for $25.

Hand crafted dice bags. These bags have an inner layer and have dice as draw string ends. Please specify the style you would like: Marvel Heroes, Marvel Covers, Spider-Man, Batman, or DC Ladies. The bags are 4x6 inches flat. Shipping is $2. 3 for $25.

includes super rare hulk starter set + full gravity feed, so nearly a full set of dice, commons and uncommons, about half the rares. Super Rare, Promo and Rare card list at bottom everything has been opened and in like new condition. as you know, the cards are slightly bent from being in the packs with dice. Will ship in a sweet zen bins storage tray and deck box for the extra cards/dice. $10 shipping to US, please inquire for international. Super Rare Hulk Promo Luke Cage Rare Doctor Octopus Lizard Vulture Dagger Cloak Scarlet Spider Firestar Mary Jane Goblin Glider Electro Green Goblin Iceman Sandman Blink Wolverine Hobgoblin
Check out my other Dice Master Starter-Sets to Save shipping costs:)

Dice Masters Amazing Spiderman ASM SET ALL Basic Action Cards ALL Common Cards (including Starter Set) ALL Uncommon Cards ALL Rare Cards BONUS: Spider-Allies and Marvel Knights Promo Cards BONUS: Amazing Spiderman Playmat 4 x Dice for each character
Opened, but unplayed! Game will not be coming with the external sleeve, because I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m a freak and I throw boxes away. Please let me know if you have any questions, Jonas

Full set of Common, Uncommon, Rares. Missing two Super Rares (Morbius , Black Cat). All cards are sleeved and include max dice. Message me for more details and be sure to check out my other Dicemasters sales! See https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/product/1297848 for pics of my complete collection.
